name: 1000-Yard Stare
flavor: You can see everything. You can unsee nothing.

name: 13098v Incognito
flavor: A flexible Vanguard-issue sniper rifle that uses nanolathed components to improve design tolerances.

name: 20/20 AMR7
flavor: Take in the sights.

name: Allowance V/C4
flavor: Match-grade sniper weapon. A scalpel for the steady-handed.

name: Amina-E7
flavor: In a Guardian's hands, a properly equipped precision rifle can gain uncanny capabilities.

name: Amplified Geo-D6
flavor: Shortest distance between two points across a curved visual axis: Aim + Squeeze.

name: Andacht 81
flavor: The booming report of the Andacht coined the phrase 'Wall thunder'.

name: Antinomy XVI
flavor: Executor-issued sniper rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Aoife Rua-D
flavor: Control the battlefield with the Häkke Aoife Rua-D.

name: Ascalon-LR1
flavor: Tall walls. Gleaming temples. Kings and queens with glittering eyes.

name: Avenue A
flavor: Looks like that poor fellow took a wrong turn.

name: Black Hammer
flavor: "I cannot permit you to exist."

name: Black Spindle
flavor: "Your only existence shall be that which I weave for you out of sorrow and woe."

name: Black Trung-D
flavor: A long range Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Broken Truth-LR1
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Calcutta-LR1
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The LR1 is a flexible weapon with excellent tolerance for wear.

name: Calcutta-LR2
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The Calcutta series hails from a lineage that once guarded the City's wall-builders.

name: Calcutta-LR2a
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The LR2a has an integrated com set, but a Guardian's Ghost renders it redundant.

name: Candace-B
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. Named for the designer, Candace throws a massive antipersonnel round.

name: Caracas-LR5
flavor: Enjoy the view, while waging war from a comfortable distance.

name: Chandragupta-A
flavor: You can't be stopped. You won't be forgotten.

name: Civilian Applications
flavor: None found.

name: Defiance of Yasmin
flavor: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

name: Deianeira-D
flavor: They underestimate you at their own peril.

name: Doom Echo XI
flavor: The name is not hyperbole.

name: Efideet's Spear
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Eirene RR4
flavor: A new Golden Age is just over the horizon. With the Omolon Eirene RR4, you'll be the first to see it coming.

name: Epitaph 2261
flavor: It's seen things you people wouldn't believe. Killed most of them, too.

name: Equiprobable LSc
flavor: If not here, could it not be elsewhere?

name: Eumolpias-SR3
flavor: Long roads. Sloping hills. Ancient roots. Keep the watch.

name: Extrasolar RR4
flavor: A sniper rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Eye of Sol
flavor: "The sun took my sight, thus the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

name: FINAL BOSS
flavor: Become the monster.

name: Glass Promontory
flavor: It is not the height of the cliff, but the struggle of the climb that clears my eyes.

name: Gozen-C
flavor: The massive Gozen-C fires a brutally powerful iridium sabot.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Use against Cabal Centurions to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Harrowed Defiance of Yasmin
flavor: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

name: Her Benevolence
flavor: A weapon carried by the Vestian Guard, the body which patrols the Reef's borders.

name: Her Fury
flavor: A weapon carried by the Vestian Guard in their fight against the Taken.

name: Hereafter
flavor: "Huddled at the mountain's base, we had no choice but to beat our ploughshares into swords once more."

name: Hieracon-LR2
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The Hieracon-LR2 is a flexible marksman platform designed for all conditions.

name: Hieracon-LR3
flavor: The multirole Hieracon is an effective generalist sniper weapon. Scope mounts may stick in cold.

name: Hieracon-LR5
flavor: Guardians eschew the weapon's bipod - a tool for those without preternatural gifts of war.

name: Ice Breaker
flavor: Please replace these components if use causes fatal damage: HEAT SINK. MAGAZINE. OPERATOR

name: Known Horizon
flavor: If you can see it, you can kill it.

name: LDR 5001
flavor: Ballistic heartbreak.

name: Low-Grade Humility
flavor: "I'm good at this."

name: Luna Chiral III
flavor: In all of us, two natures dwell.

name: Luna Phasar III
flavor: Be the shear. Unstitch a foe molecule by molecule.

name: Luna Vallar IV
flavor: A precise whisper is more powerful than an echoing scream.

name: Matuta RR4
flavor: Bring forth the dawn.

name: Neutrino LSm
flavor: Can anything stop you?

name: No Land Beyond
flavor: Every hit blazes the path to our reclamation.

name: Omolon Test RR1
flavor: Omolon prototype. Use against Fallen Captains to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

name: Painted Sammuramat-C
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke sniper rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Patience and Time
flavor: If you've got it, they'll never see it coming.

name: Pompeii-LR2
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The Pompeii-LR2 is an accurized Hieracon variant for long-range shots.

name: Pompeii-LR3
flavor: An accurized sniper rifle named for the site of an ancient disaster.

name: Pompeii-LR5
flavor: Extinction never felt so good.

name: Praedyth's Revenge
flavor: Praedyth's fall isn't over… because it hasn't happened yet… and it will happen again.

name: Prudence II
flavor: Executor-issued sharpshooter's weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Saigon-LR5
flavor: Carefully balanced capabilities, a bristling array of extended systems, and a deadly calm.

name: Scipio-E
flavor: The Scipio-Echo is a portable lesson in the meaning of 'ballistic trauma'.

name: Shadow of Veils
flavor: Judgment on the unseen is best performed from a distance.

name: Silvered Boudicca-D
flavor: A powerful Häkke sniper rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Silvered Caracas-LR4
flavor: A highly accurate Daito sniper rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Silvered Mulan-D
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Stillpiercer
flavor: By the time they know you're there, it's already too late.

name: Subtle Nudge DN7
flavor: With the right touch, they all fall down.

name: SUROS JLL-19
flavor: Lightweight. Precise. Modular. SUROS.

name: Tamar-D
flavor: With the Häkke Tamar-D, they'll never see you coming.

name: Tao Hua Yuan
flavor: One day, the flowers will grow again.

name: The Chosen
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Majestic
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: The Supremacy
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Tomyris-E2
flavor: "If my rifle gets any smarter I'm afraid I'll fall for her." - Anahera-3, Exo hunter

name: Trajan-B
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The long-barrel Trajan Bravo offers good accuracy.

name: Trajan-C
flavor: Accurized long-barrel sniper weapon. Often arrives with unusual onboard systems.

name: Uzume RR4
flavor: With the Uzume RR4 on your side, the Darkness doesn't stand a chance.

name: Violator XII
flavor: Executor-issued sharpshooter's weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Vulpecula
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the little fox of the night sky.

name: Weyloran's March
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Y-09 Longbow Synthesis
flavor: Closer Than You Think

name: Zen Meteor
flavor: Complete awareness, complete focus. A mind sharpened by diligence to a single deadly point.

name: 20/20 AMR7
flavor: Take in the sights.

name: But Not Forgotten
flavor: Not even the dead are truly gone.

name: Devil's Dawn
flavor: "My arms are red and manifold, and nothing is beyond my grasp."

name: EX MACHINA~
flavor: Eirene ~If (SIVA) return replicate // else if (!SIVA) run ascension()~

name: The Laughing Heart
flavor: Forged in honor of Gheleon, he who taught us to cherish both the rainy days and the sunny.

name: The Winged Word
flavor: "You cannot keep it silent." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Bitter Edge 010
flavor: A sniper rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Deposition VII
flavor: Executor-issued sniper rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Event Horizon
flavor: Point me toward the point of no return.

name: Seventh Sense
flavor: It's difficult to explain… But, if you have it, you'll know.
